vote.motion-ch: FCR(2013-14)3 總目184 – 追加撥款1億元，以便向賑災基金注資，及批准財政司司長根據賑災基金諮詢委員會的意見，發放每宗超逾800萬元的撥款，為內地四川地震災民提供緊急救援
vote.motion-en: FCR(2013-14)3 HEAD 184 – To approve supplementary provision of $100 m to inject to the Disaster Relief Fund (DRF) and to approve the FS to make grants each in excess of $8 m to provide emergency relief to earthquake victims in Sichuan upon the advice of the DRF Advisory Committee
